game.name: Slice of Zen
game.description:
Slicing things or objects give amazing fun to many players. If you also enjoy the slicing games, trying out Slice of Zen can be a nice decision for you. Your objective in this brand new game is to slice away as much of the object possible to clear the level. No, you cannot have the hints to use to guide you throughout the gameplay. All you need to do is to put your brain and logical analysis to the test to complete all the levels with the highest possible score. 

Put your fingers on your mouse on desktop or tap the screen to slice and dice your way through multiple randomly seen objects! You would be given three chances to slice every object. Make sure to make just part or most of its part fall off the platform. Try to slice clear at least 80% of the object from the platform to complete each level! The difficulties will keep becoming more complex as you progress in the game. Do your best to knock as much of the object off the ledge as you can with the help of 3 slices!

There are 20 unique and challenging levels to enjoy in this html5 puzzle game. The Zen theme will allow you to slice different types of objects to slice. Give it a try to enjoy the best relaxation and have fun with your friends without download! The power of gravity will be on your side so take its advantage to complete all the levels and become a master of this latest slicing arcade challenge. Have blast friends!!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE ON SCREEN TO SLICE THE OBJECT
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK OF MOUSE AND SWIPE TO SLICE
